document.full_text: general motors  plans to more than double its sales in china to around 5 million units by 2015, its china head said on monday, unveiling the company's five-year plan for the world's biggest auto market.
document.title: gm eyes doubling of china sales by 2015
lines_and_colors: general motors  plans to more than double its sales in china to around 5 million units by 2015, its china head said on monday, unveiling the company's five-year plan for the world's biggest auto market.
